pages.text: Say: He is Allah the One and Only
Allah is the Self-Sufficient (independent of all, while all are dependent on Him)
He begets not, nor is He begotten
And there is none comparable to Him
Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of the dawn
from the mischief of all that He has created
and from the mischief of darkness when it overspreads
from the mischief of those who blow on knots (black magic)
and from the mischief of the envier when he envies
Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of the mankind
from the mischief of the slinking whisperers (Satan and his workers)
who whisper into the hearts of people
from among the jinn or from the mankind
